exceptions.exn: In environment l : Label cn : nid pts, others : seq nid Hnin : cn \ otin pts PtsNonEmpty : pts != [::] d : dstatelet ds : heap ps : PStateT lg : Log pt : [ordType of nid] i : mid n : [ordType of nid] H : pt != n H0 : coh d H1 : pt_state d ps lg pt Unable to unify "st :-> ps \\+ log :-> lg" with "loc pt {| dstate := upd n ds (dstate d); dsoup := consume_msg (dsoup d) i |}".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
l: Ordered.sort Label
cn: nid
others: seq nid
pts: seq nid
Hnin: is_true (cn \notin pts)
PtsNonEmpty: is_true (pts != [::])
d: dstatelet
ds: heap
ps: PStateT
lg: Log
pt: Equality.sort [ordType of nid]
i: Ordered.sort mid
n: Ordered.sort [ordType of nid]

Goal:
pt != n -> coh d -> pt_state d ps lg pt -> pt_state {| dstate := upd n ds (dstate d); dsoup := consume_msg (dsoup d) i |} ps lg pt

Premises:
dsoup = fun d : dstatelet => let (_, dsoup) := d in dsoup : dstatelet -> soup
is_true = eq^~ true : bool -> Prop Arguments is_true _%bool_scope is_true is a coercion
Record dstatelet : Type := DStatelet { dstate : lstate_type heap; dsoup : soup }
sort : forall T : Type, rel T -> seq T -> seq T
pt_state = fun (d : dstatelet) (p : PStateT) (l : Log) (pt : nid) => loc pt d = st :-> p \+ log :-> l : dstatelet -> PStateT -> Log -> nid -> Prop
dstate = fun d : dstatelet => let (dstate, _) := d in dstate : dstatelet -> lstate_type heap
PStateT = (nat * PState)%type : Set
consume_msg = fun (s : soup) (id : mid) => match find id s with | Some m => upd id (mark_msg m) s | None => s end : soup -> mid -> soup
Log = seq (bool * seq nat) : Set
mid = [ordType of nat] : ordType
Notation heap := Heap.heap
Notation ordType := Ordered.type
nid = nat : Set
upd : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (cT : union_map_class K V), K -> V -> cT -> cT
Notation seq := list
Label = [ordType of nat] : ordType
cn_state_consume : forall (d : dstatelet) (ds : heap) (cs : CStateT) (lg : Log) (i : mid) (n : [ordType of nid]), cn != n -> coh d -> cn_state d cs lg -> cn_state {| dstate := upd n ds (dstate d); dsoup := consume_msg (dsoup d) i |} cs lg
getLocalU : forall (n : nid) (m : [ordType of nid]) (d : dstatelet) (s : soup), valid (dstate d) -> m \in dom (dstate d) -> loc n d = loc n {| dstate := upd m (loc m d) (dstate d); dsoup := s |}
PhaseOne_PGotRequest_next_data_pt : forall (d : dstatelet) (pt : nat_eqType) (round : nat) (lg : Log) (next_data : data) (r : nat) (nd : data), coh d -> pt \in pts -> pt_state d (r, PGotRequest nd) lg pt -> PhaseOne d round next_data lg -> [/\ pt_state d (round, PGotRequest next_data) lg pt, no_msg_from_to pt cn (dsoup d) & no_msg_from_to cn pt (dsoup d)]
pt_PhaseTwoAbortE : forall (d : dstatelet) (e : nat) (dt : data) (lg : Log) (pt : nat_eqType) (to : nat) (ds : heap) (tms : TaggedMessage), let d' := {| dstate := upd cn ds (dstate d); dsoup := (post_msg (dsoup d) {| content := tms; from := cn; to := to; active := true |}).1 |} in coh d -> pt \in pts -> (pt == to) = false -> (forall z : nat, (z == cn) = false -> loc z d' = loc z d) -> pt_PhaseTwoAbort d e dt lg pt -> pt_PhaseTwoAbort d' e dt lg pt
pt_PhaseTwoCommitE : forall (d : dstatelet) (e : nat) (dt : data) (lg : Log) (pt : nat_eqType) (to : nat) (ds : heap) (tms : TaggedMessage), let d' := {| dstate := upd cn ds (dstate d); dsoup := (post_msg (dsoup d) {| content := tms; from := cn; to := to; active := true |}).1 |} in coh d -> pt \in pts -> (pt == to) = false -> (forall z : nat, (z == cn) = false -> loc z d' = loc z d) -> pt_PhaseTwoCommit d e dt lg pt -> pt_PhaseTwoCommit d' e dt lg pt
pt_PhaseOneE : forall (d : dstatelet) (e : nat) (dt : data) (lg : Log) (pt : nat_eqType) (to : nat) (ds : heap) (tms : TaggedMessage), let d' := {| dstate := upd cn ds (dstate d); dsoup := (post_msg (dsoup d) {| content := tms; from := cn; to := to; active := true |}).1 |} in coh d -> pt \in pts -> (pt == to) = false -> (forall z : nat, (z == cn) = false -> loc z d' = loc z d) -> pt_PhaseOne d e dt lg pt -> pt_PhaseOne d' e dt lg pt
pt_PhaseOneRespondedE : forall (d : dstatelet) (e : nat) (dt : data) (lg : Log) (b : bool) (pt : nat_eqType) (to : nat) (ds : heap) (tms : TaggedMessage), let d' := {| dstate := upd cn ds (dstate d); dsoup := (post_msg (dsoup d) {| content := tms; from := cn; to := to; active := true |}).1 |} in coh d -> pt \in pts -> (pt == to) = false -> (forall z : nat, (z == cn) = false -> loc z d' = loc z d) -> pt_PhaseOneResponded d e dt lg b pt -> pt_PhaseOneResponded d' e dt lg b pt
locU : forall (n n' : nat_eqType) (x : heap) (st : union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC nat_ordType heap)) (s : soup), n != n' -> valid st -> loc n {| dstate := upd n' x st; dsoup := s |} = loc n {| dstate := st; dsoup := s |}
locE' : forall (d : dstatelet) (n : nid) (x : heap) (y : soup), valid (dstate d) -> loc n {| dstate := upd n x (dstate d); dsoup := y |} = x
pt_PhaseOne = fun (d : dstatelet) (round : nat) (next_data : data) (l : Log) (pt : nid) => [\/ [/\ pt_state d (round, PInit) l pt, no_msg_from_to pt cn (dsoup d) & msg_spec cn pt Exports.prep_req (round :: next_data) (dsoup d)], [/\ pt_state d (round, PGotRequest next_data) l pt, no_msg_from_to pt cn (dsoup d) & no_msg_from_to cn pt (dsoup d)], [/\ pt_state d (round, PRespondedYes next_data) l pt, no_msg_from_to cn pt (dsoup d) & msg_spec pt cn Exports.prep_yes [:: round] (dsoup d)] | [/\ pt_state d (round, PRespondedNo next_data) l pt, no_msg_from_to cn pt (dsoup d) & msg_spec pt cn Exports.prep_no [:: round] (dsoup d)]] : dstatelet ->...-> Prop Arguments pt_PhaseOne _ _%nat_scope
pt_PhaseTwoAbort = fun (d : dstatelet) (round : nat) (next_data : data) (l : Log) (pt : nid) => [\/ [/\ pt_state d (round, PRespondedYes next_data) l pt \/ pt_state d (round, PRespondedNo next_data) l pt, msg_spec cn pt Exports.abort_req [:: round] (dsoup d) & no_msg_from_to pt cn (dsoup d)], [/\ pt_state d (round, PAborted next_data) (rcons l (false, next_data)) pt, no_msg_from_to cn pt (dsoup d) & no_msg_from_to pt cn (dsoup d)] | [/\ pt_state d (round.+1, PInit) (rcons l (false, next_data)) pt, no_msg_from_to cn pt (dsoup d) & msg_spec pt cn Exports.abort_ack [:: round] (dsoup d)]] : dstatelet -> nat -> data -> Log -> nid -> Prop Arguments pt_PhaseTwoAbort _ _%nat_scope
pt_PhaseTwoCommit = fun (d : dstatelet) (round : nat) (next_data : data) (l : Log) (pt : nid) => [\/ [/\ pt_state d (round, PRespondedYes next_data) l pt, msg_spec cn pt Exports.commit_req [:: round] (dsoup d) & no_msg_from_to pt cn (dsoup d)], [/\ pt_state d (round, PCommitted next_data) (rcons l (true, next_data)) pt, no_msg_from_to cn pt (dsoup d) & no_msg_from_to pt cn (dsoup d)] | [/\ pt_state d (round.+1, PInit) (rcons l (true, next_data)) pt, no_msg_from_to cn pt (dsoup d) & msg_spec pt cn Exports.commit_ack [:: round] (dsoup d)]] : dstatelet -> nat -> data -> Log -> nid -> Prop Arguments pt_PhaseTwoCommit _ _%nat_scope
Ordered.sort = fun t : ordType => let (sort, _) := t in sort : ordType -> Type Ordered.sort is a coercion
locE : forall (i : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet) (n : nid) (k : Label) (x : heap) (y : soup), k \in dom i -> valid i -> valid (dstate (getStatelet i k)) -> loc n (getStatelet (upd k {| dstate := upd n x (dstate (getStatelet i k)); dsoup := y |} i) k) = x
pt_state_functional : forall (d : dstatelet) (pt : nid) (ps1 : PStateT) (lg1 : Log) (ps2 : PStateT) (lg2 : Log), valid (loc pt d) -> pt_state d ps1 lg1 pt -> pt_state d ps2 lg2 pt -> ps1 = ps2 /\ lg1 = lg2
pt_PhaseOneResponded = fun (d : dstatelet) (round : nat) (next_data : data) (l : Log) (committed : bool) (pt : nid) => [/\ no_msg_from_to cn pt (dsoup d), no_msg_from_to pt cn (dsoup d) & if committed then pt_state d (round, PRespondedYes next_data) l pt else pt_state d (round, PRespondedNo next_data) l pt] : dstatelet -> nat -> data -> Log -> bool -> nid -> Prop Arguments pt_PhaseOneResponded _ _%nat_scope _ _ _%bool_scope
tpc_coh = fun (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid) (d : dstatelet) => [/\ soupCoh cn pts (dsoup d), dom (dstate d) =i nodes cn pts others, valid (dstate d) & forall n : nat_eqType, n \in nodes cn pts others -> localCoh cn pts n (loc n d)] : nid -> seq nid -> seq nid -> dstatelet -> Prop Arguments tpc_coh _ (_ _)%seq_scope
pt_Init = fun (d : dstatelet) (round : nat) (l : Log) (pt : nid) => [/\ pt_state d (round, PInit) l pt, no_msg_from_to pt cn (dsoup d) & no_msg_from_to cn pt (dsoup d)] : dstatelet -> nat -> Log -> nid -> Prop Arguments pt_Init _ _%nat_scope
Record mixin_of (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : Pred dstatelet) : Prop := Mixin { _ : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dstate d); _ : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dsoup d); _ : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> dom (dstate d) =i nodes d } Arguments Coherence.mixin_of _%function_scope Arguments Coherence.Mixin [nodes]%function_scope [coh] (_ _ _)%function_scope
CohPredMixin : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : Pred dstatelet), (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dstate d)) -> (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dsoup d)) -> (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> dom (dstate d) =i nodes d) -> Coherence.mixin_of nodes coh
Coherence.Mixin : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : Pred dstatelet), (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dstate d)) -> (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dsoup d)) -> (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> dom (dstate d) =i nodes d) -> Coherence.mixin_of nodes coh
dom_freshn : forall (V : Type) (f : union_map [ordType of nat] V) (n : nat), fresh f + n \notin dom f
cn_PhaseOneReceive = fun (d : dstatelet) (round : nat) (next_data : data) (l : Log) (recvd : seq (nid * bool)) => let rps := [seq i.1 | i <- recvd] in [/\ cn_state d (round, CWaitPrepResponse next_data recvd) l, uniq rps, {subset rps <= pts}, forall (pt : nat_eqType) (b : bool_eqType), pt \in pts -> (pt, b) \in recvd -> pt_PhaseOneResponded d round next_data l b pt & forall pt : nat_eqType, pt \in pts -> pt \notin rps -> pt_PhaseOne d round next_data l pt] : dstatelet -> nat -> data -> Log -> seq (nid * bool) -> Prop Arguments cn_PhaseOneReceive _ _%nat_scope _ _ _%seq_scope
pts_in : forall (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid) (n : nat_eqType), n \in pts -> n \in nodes cn pts others
valid_fresh' : forall (V : Type) (f : union_map [ordType of nat] V) (v : V) (i : [ordType of nat]) (w : V), valid (f \+ i \\-> w) -> valid (f \+ fresh (f \+ i \\-> w) \\-> v)
l3 : forall (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid) (d : dstatelet), tpc_coh cn pts others d -> dom (dstate d) =i nodes cn pts others
last_key_dom : forall (V : Type) (f : union_map [ordType of nat] V), valid f -> last_key f \notin dom f -> f = Unit
mt_nodes = (fun _evar_0_ : [::] =i [::] => eq_ind_r (fun _pattern_value_ : seq [ordType of nid] => _pattern_value_ =i [::]) _evar_0_ (dom0 (union_mapUMC [ordType of nid] heap))) (fun x : [ordType of nid] => erefl (x \in [::])) : dom (dstate empty_dstatelet) =i [::]
dom_ordfresh : forall (V : Type) (f : union_map [ordType of nat] V) (x : [ordType of nat]), x \in dom f -> x < fresh f
network_step_sind : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (P : SProp), (s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> P) ->...-> P
network_step_ind : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (P : Prop), (s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> P) ->...-> P
last_key : forall V : Type, union_map [ordType of nat] V -> nat
fresh : forall V : Type, union_map [ordType of nat] V -> nat
cn_PhaseOneSend = fun (d : dstatelet) (round : nat) (next_data : data) (l : Log) (sent : seq nid) => [/\ cn_state d (round, CSentPrep next_data sent) l, uniq sent, {subset sent <= pts} & forall pt : nat_eqType, pt \in pts -> if pt \in sent then pt_PhaseOne d round next_data l pt else pt_Init d round l pt] : dstatelet -> nat -> data -> Log -> seq nid -> Prop Arguments cn_PhaseOneSend _ _%nat_scope _ _ _%seq_scope
heapUMC = UMC.Pack {| UMC.p := fun k : ptr_ordType => k != null; UMC.mixin := heapUMCMix |} : union_map_class ptr_ordType (dynamic id)
Inductive network_step (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) : Prop := Idle : s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> network_step w this s1 s2 | SendMsg : forall (l : Label) (st : send_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol w l))), st \In get_st w l -> forall (to : nid) (msg : seq nat) (b : heap), this \in Protocols.Exports.nodes (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s1 l) -> l \in dom s1 -> Coh w s1 ->...-> network_step w this s1 s2 Arguments Idle [w] _ [s1 s2] Arguments SendMsg [w this s1 s2 l st] _ [to] [msg]%seq_scope [b] _ _ _ [S] Arguments ReceiveMsg [w this s1 s2 l rt] _ [i] [from]%nat_scope [pf] _ [C msg0]
dom_fresh : forall (V : Type) (f : union_map [ordType of nat] V), fresh f \notin dom f
cohDom : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (d : dstatelet), d \In coh -> dom (dstate d) =i nodes d
empty_dstatelet = {| dstate := empty_lstate [::]; dsoup := Unit |} : dstatelet
dom_last_key : forall (V : Type) (f : union_map [ordType of nat] V), valid f -> ~~ empb f -> last_key f \in dom f

```coq
intros.
intros Neq Coh_d Pt_state_d.
unfold pt_state in Pt_state_d.
unfold pt_state.
simpl.
split.
- rewrite upd_same; auto.
- rewrite upd_diff; auto.
Qed.```

original: intros. intros Neq Coh_d Pt_state_d. unfold pt_state in Pt_state_d. unfold pt_state. simpl. split. - rewrite upd_same; auto. - rewrite upd_diff; auto.
